title: BMW unveils Rs 33 lakh superbike in India: Boasts 999 cc engine, 280 kmph top speed, 0 to 100 in 3 seconds
description: BMW Motorrad has introduced its latest superbike, the BMW M 1000 R, to the Indian market. The bike offers two variants, priced at Rs 33 lakh and Rs 38 lakh respectively, and deliveries are expected to begin in January 2024. The M 1000 R is the first BMW naked bike to surpass 200 horsepower, powered by a 999 cc engine.
